body:
PARQUET_OBJECT_STORE_SPLIT_SIZE Query Option

Use the PARQUET_OBJECT_STORE_SPLIT_SIZE query option to control the Parquet format specific split sizes on non-block based stores, e.g. S3, ADLS, etc.

The value must be greater than or equal to 1 MB.

Type:INT

Default: 256 MB

Added in: Impala 3.4
title: PARQUET_OBJECT_STORE_SPLIT_SIZE Query Option
